value.name: The Mists of Avalon
value.overview: The Mists of Avalon is a 2001 miniseries based on the novel of the same name by Marion Zimmer Bradley. It was produced by American cable channel TNT and directed by Uli Edel.

value.name: Avalon, Knight of the Round Table
value.overview:
Orcs, elves, fairies…These and many others are together known as the “Folk of the Faye.”

Long ago, the lands of England were ravaged by the flames of a war between humans and the Folk of the Faye.

And now, the flames of war are brewing once again, on another island nation far to the east.

The one who defends the helpless is the last knight of the round table, bearing a name steeped in legend. His name is Avalon, Knight of the Round Table!
